item.title: Windows 10
item.author: invalid@example.com (TAZTG)
item.dc:creator: TAZTG
item.content:encoded: Just upgraded the Laptop to Windows 10. No problems what so ever, saved all apps that were installed. Had to uninstall 3 Samsung Apps that were unsupported. Turned off all the crap to share WiFi and stuff. Still playing around but looks and runs good. Anyone else upgrade yet?

item.title: Guild Wars 2
item.author: invalid@example.com (TAZTG)
item.dc:creator: TAZTG
item.content:encoded:
New Profession infom posted. Guardian (leaked last week PC Gamer)
Here's the official info.
http://www.guildwars2.com/en/the-game/professions/guardian/

Looks a like they combined a few professions. This looks like a fun Profession to play.
I will probably create the following right off but its not set in stone..
Human Guardian
Human Nec
Sylvari Ele
Norn Warrior

item.title: Computer Problems/Upgrades/Info
item.author: invalid@example.com («BuA»Lurker_71)
item.dc:creator: «BuA»Lurker_71
item.content:encoded:
I thought it might be a good idea to have a thread that we could post computer problems, information, and time required for fixes, etc...

Let me start this one by saying that I will be upgrading my current comp, and rebuilding my old one today.

I'm not sure exactly how long this will take, but I assume that it will last at least 4 hours (or more).

This also means that I will have to reinstall UT, maps, skins, etc...

However, I am currently making backups of that data, so no fear...

Computer Problems/Upgrades/Info

item.title: possible new game
item.author: invalid@example.com («BuA»Lurker_71)
item.dc:creator: «BuA»Lurker_71
item.content:encoded:
Just thought you guys might like to know; there's a game on Steam called Orion: Dino Horde on sale for $.99
It's FPS, and has instagib... you know; in case you guys might like to get together and frag some dinosaurs, or play some team sports again.
I got the game earlier today. Let me know if you guys are interested.
I don't seem to be getting my mail from «BuA» like I used to, so you can get ahold of me via email at celticiguana@gmail.com or on facebook at Raymond NaMairbh.

item.title: DVD Home Theater Sound System
item.author: invalid@example.com (TAZTG)
item.dc:creator: TAZTG
item.content:encoded:
Hey Boys, we decided to upgrade to Blue Ray downstairs with a nice Sound Bar.
This means the Panasonic SC-PT950 needs a new home.
As the thread title states it's the whole system and can even play AM/FM/Satelite/IPOD through the system. You all have heard it and watched movies as well as XBox stuff. Let me know who wants the system. You can pick it up at TAZ-LAN.
I have one more piece to dig out of the other boxes (MIC) it's in there somewhere other then that its ready to go.
Look the...

DVD Home Theater Sound System

item.title: Song Lyrics
item.author: invalid@example.com (TAZTG)
item.dc:creator: TAZTG
item.content:encoded:
Hey Guys thought this would be fun or at least a distraction for a few minutes.

Post a snippet from some songs you really like that the lyrics make you think. Some snippets have personnel meanings, some are just plain true and others make you go WoW did they just say that! Anyway here are a few so follow my example if you dare!

"Good Times Bad Times" Zeppelin

In the days of my youth, I was told what it means to be a man,
Now I've reached that age, I've tried to do all...

Song Lyrics

item.title: The Comeback
item.author: invalid@example.com (Bonedigger)
item.dc:creator: Bonedigger
item.content:encoded:
Well my BuA brethren I was going to just text Jim and let him know I'd be on guild wars tonight but then I remembered....We have a forum lol. I don't know how often anyone reads this anymore but I'm doing it anyways.

I'll be back on tonight but will still have a lot of school work to do in the upcoming weeks until I graduate in May. Yes, me, the kid who kicked your ass when he was 10...graduating from college . So anyways, my comeback may be short lived but it's a start. Just have to...

The Comeback
